<style 
      xmlns="http://purl.org/net/xbiblio/csl"
      class="in-text"
      version="1.0"
      xml:lang="en">
  <info>
    <id />
    <title />
    <updated>2009-08-10T04:49:00+09:00</updated>
  </info>
  <locale xml:lang="en">
    <option name="punctuation-in-quote" value="true" />
  </locale>
  <citation>
    <layout suffix=".">
      <group delimiter=", ">
        <names variable="author">
          <name form="short" />
        </names>
        <text quotes="true" variable="title" />
        <date variable="issued">
          <date-part name="year" />
        </date>
      </group>
    </layout>
  </citation>
</style>
